name: One Last Haul
description:
One Last Haul

WEB GL Build and Scoreboard.
Click here to play - https://olh.nightember.com/olh/

Your just a man trying to get one last haul of fish and bring them to market! You start in your home port, and must race around the map collecting as many fish as you can before the day is over. Make sure to head back to port in time to drop of those sweet, sweet fishes and add your name to the scoreboard.
Track your scores against others, and lets see who the best Fisherman is!

-Controls

- WASD to control boat

- Left click at a fishing Node to fish

- Align your clicks to catch the fish before the green bar fills

- Go back to your original dock before the timer and right click to sell your haul.
